00016 CMenu::CMenu(char menu_mode, CExeFile &ExeFile,
00017    CSavedGame &SavedGame,
00018    stOption *pOption, Uint8 DlgTheme,
00019    bool &restartVideo) :
00020 CBaseMenu(DlgTheme),
00021 m_demoback(false),
00022 mp_Dialog(NULL),
00023 m_Episode(ExeFile.getEpisode()),
00024 m_ExeFile(ExeFile),
00025 m_GamePath(ExeFile.getDataDirectory()),
00026 m_SavedGame(SavedGame),
00027 mp_option(pOption),
00028 m_menu_mode(menu_mode),
00029 m_choosegame(false),
00030 m_overwrite(false),
00031 m_Endgame(false),
00032 m_quit(false),
00033 m_selection(NO_SELECTION),
00034 m_lastselect(-1),
00035 m_menu_type(MAIN),
00036 m_NumPlayers(0),
00037 m_Difficulty(NO_SELECTION),
00038 m_saveslot(0),
00039 m_restartVideo(restartVideo)
00040 {}
00041 
00042 void CMenu::init( menutypes menu_type )
00043 {
00044  m_menu_type = menu_type;
00045  m_selection = NO_SELECTION; // Nothing has been selected yet.
00046 
00047  switch(m_menu_type)
00048  {
00049  case QUIT:
00050   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CConfirmMenu("   Quit the game?   ", m_quit, m_dlg_theme)); break;
00051  case ENDGAME:
00052   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CConfirmMenu("   End your game?   ", m_quit, m_Endgame)); break;
00053  case NEW:
00054  {
00055   // you want to start a new game. Well, I need to know the amount of players and difficulty
00056   std::list<std::string> players_list;
00057   for(size_t i=1 ; i<=MAX_PLAYERS ; i++)
00058    players_list.push_back(itoa(i) + " Player");
00059 
00060   std::list<std::string> diff_list;
00061   diff_list.push_back("Easy");
00062   diff_list.push_back("Normal");
00063   diff_list.push_back("Hard");
00064 
00065   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CSelectionMenu<Uint8>( m_NumPlayers, players_list, m_dlg_theme) );
00066   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CSelectionMenu<Sint8>( m_Difficulty, diff_list, m_dlg_theme, 1 ) );
00067  }
00068  break;
00069  case CONFIGURE:
00070   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CSettingsMenu(m_dlg_theme, m_ExeFile, mp_option, m_restartVideo)); break;
00071  case AUDIO:
00072   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CSettingsMenu(m_dlg_theme, m_ExeFile, mp_option, m_restartVideo, 1)); break;
00073  case CONTROLS:
00074   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CSettingsMenu(m_dlg_theme, m_ExeFile, mp_option, m_restartVideo, 3)); break;
00075  case SAVE:
00076   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CSaveMenu(m_dlg_theme, m_SavedGame)); break;
00077  case LOAD:
00078   m_SubMenus.push_back(new CLoadMenu(m_dlg_theme, m_SavedGame)); break;
00079  default:
00080   break;
00081  }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void CMenu::initMainMenu()
00085 {
00086  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(17, 10, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN,m_dlg_theme);
00087 
00088  // Being at Intro, Title or Demo mode
00089  if( m_menu_mode == PASSIVE )
00090  {
00091   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 1, "New Game");
00092   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 2, "Load Game");
00093   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_DISABLED, 1, 3,  "Save Game");
00094   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 4, "High Scores");
00095   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 5, "Configure");
00096   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 6, "Back to Demo");
00097   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 7, "Choose Game");
00098   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 8, "Quit");
00099  }
00100  // When Player is playing
00101  if( m_menu_mode == ACTIVE )
00102  {
00103   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 1, "New Game");
00104   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 2, "Load Game");
00105   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, "Save Game");
00106   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 4, "High Scores");
00107   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 5, "Configure");
00108   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 6, "Back to Game");
00109   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 7, "End Game");
00110   mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 8, "Quit");
00111  }
00112 }
00113 
00114 ////
00115 // Process
00116 ////
00117 void CMenu::process()
00118 {
00119  if( g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KM) && g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KO) && g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KD) )
00120  {
00121   cleanup();
00122   init(MODCONF);
00123  }
00124 
00125  if( !m_SubMenus.empty() )
00126  {
00127   CBaseMenu *SubMenu = m_SubMenus.front();
00128   SubMenu->processCommon();
00129   SubMenu->processSpecific();
00130   SubMenu->postProcess();
00131 
00132   if(SubMenu->mustClose())
00133   {
00134    SAFE_DELETE(SubMenu);
00135    m_SubMenus.pop_front();
00136   }
00137  }
00138  else
00139  {
00140   if(mp_Dialog)
00141   {
00142    // Get Input for selection
00143    if( g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_JUMP) || g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_STATUS) )
00144    {
00145     m_selection = mp_Dialog->getSelection();
00146    }
00147 
00148    if( mp_Dialog->getInputMode(INPUT_MODE_LEFT_RIGHT) )
00149    {
00150     if( g_pInput->getPressedKey(KY) )
00151     {
00152      m_selection = 1;
00153     }
00154     else if( g_pInput->getPressedKey(KN) )
00155     {
00156      m_selection = 2;
00157     }
00158    }
00159 
00160    if( g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_QUIT) )
00161    {
00162     if(m_menu_mode == PASSIVE)
00163      m_SubMenus.push_back(new CConfirmMenu("   Quit the game?   ", m_quit, m_dlg_theme));
00164     else
00165      m_mustclose = true;
00166    }
00167    mp_Dialog->processInput();
00168 
00169    // Draw the menu
00170    mp_Dialog->draw();
00171   }
00172 
00173   processMainMenu();
00174  }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void CMenu::processMainMenu()
00178 {
00179  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION )
00180  {
00181   if( m_menu_mode == PASSIVE )
00182   {
00183    switch(m_selection)
00184    {
00185    case 0: init(NEW); break;
00186    case 1: init(LOAD); break;
00187    case 4: init(CONFIGURE);break;
00188    case 5: m_demoback = true; break;
00189    case 6: m_choosegame = true;break;
00190    case 7: init(QUIT);break;
00191    }
00192   }
00193   else if( m_menu_mode == ACTIVE )
00194   {
00195    switch(m_selection)
00196    {
00197    case 0: init(NEW); break;
00198    case 1: init(LOAD); break;
00199    case 2: init(SAVE);break;
00200    case 4: init(CONFIGURE);break;
00201    case 5: m_mustclose = true; break;
00202    case 6: m_SubMenus.push_back(new CConfirmMenu("Back to Titlescreen?", m_Endgame, m_dlg_theme));
00203      m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00204      break;
00205    case 7: init(QUIT);break;
00206    }
00207   }
00208  }
00209 }

00211 ////
00212 // Cleanup Routines
00213 ////
00214 void CMenu::cleanup()
00215 {
00216  // Close the old menu
00217  while(!m_SubMenus.empty())
00218  {
00219   delete m_SubMenus.front();
00220   m_SubMenus.pop_back();
00221  }
00222  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Dialog);
00223 }
00224 
00225 
00226 CMenu::~CMenu()
00227 {
00228  cleanup();
00229 }
